languages.text: Наслышанные о богатстве Вольного Торговца, техножрецы запрашивают финансирование для своих исследований. Механикус обещают поделиться прибылью — побочным продуктом познания — и внести имя благодетел{mf|я|ьницы} в благословенный дата-массив ценных союзников.

Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.
languages.original_text: Наслышанные о богатстве Вольного Торговца, техножрецы запрашивают финансирование для своих исследований. Механикус обещают поделиться прибылью — побочным продуктом познания — и внести имя благодетел{mf|я|ьницы} в благословенный дата-массив ценных союзников.

traits.locale_text: Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their {mf|benefactor's|benefactress's} name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their {mf|benefactor's|benefactress's} name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their {mf|benefactor's|benefactress's} name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their {mf|benefactor's|benefactress's} name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

languages.text: 众多技术神甫听说了许多关于行商浪人富甲一方的传闻，希望行商浪人能慷慨解囊，为他们的研究提供资金。这些机械修会的专家承诺，会与行商浪人分享知识带来的副产品与利润，还会将赞助者的名字列入受祝福的数据洪流中，将行商浪人视为有价值的盟友。
languages.original_text: Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

traits.locale_text: 众多技术神甫听说了许多关于行商浪人富甲一方的传闻，希望行商浪人能慷慨解囊，为他们的研究提供资金。这些机械修会的专家承诺，会与行商浪人分享知识带来的副产品与利润，还会将赞助者的名字列入受祝福的数据洪流中，将行商浪人视为有价值的盟友。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの富にまつわる多くの話を聞きつけて、技術司祭たちは研究資金の提供を求めている。帝国技術局は、知識を得る過程で生まれる副産物である利益の一部を分け与えることを約束し、その支援者の名を貴重な同盟者の祝福されたデータベースに記録すると言っている。
languages.original_text: Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの富にまつわる多くの話を聞きつけて、技術司祭たちは研究資金の提供を求めている。帝国技術局は、知識を得る過程で生まれる副産物である利益の一部を分け与えることを約束し、その支援者の名を貴重な同盟者の祝福されたデータベースに記録すると言っている。

languages.text: Die Techpriester haben viele Geschichten über den Wohlstand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gehört und fordern Geldmittel für ihre Forschung. Das Adeptus Mechanicus verspricht, seine Profite – Nebenprodukt des Ansammelns von Wissen – zu teilen und den Namen {mf|ihres Gönners|ihrer Gönnerin} in der gesegneten Datensammlung wertvoller Verbündeter aufzunehmen.
languages.original_text: Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

traits.locale_text: Die Techpriester haben viele Geschichten über den Wohlstand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gehört und fordern Geldmittel für ihre Forschung. Das Adeptus Mechanicus verspricht, seine Profite – Nebenprodukt des Ansammelns von Wissen – zu teilen und den Namen {mf|ihres Gönners|ihrer Gönnerin} in der gesegneten Datensammlung wertvoller Verbündeter aufzunehmen.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in servetine dair söylemler her yana yayıldı, dolayısıyla Tekno Rahipler araştırmalarına finansman talep ediyor. Adeptus Mechanicus, irfandan doğacak kârı paylaşmayı ve hamilerinin adını kutsal veri dizinindeki değerli müttefikler hanesine işlemeyi vadediyor.
languages.original_text: Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in servetine dair söylemler her yana yayılmıştır, dolayısıyla Tekno Rahipler araştırmalarına finansman talep eder. Adeptus Mechanicus, irfandan doğacak kârı paylaşmayı ve hamilerinin adını kutsal veri dizinindeki değerli müttefikler hanesine işlemeyi vadetmektedir.

languages.text: Tras escuchar una multitud de historias sobre la riqueza de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los tecnosacerdotes solicitan ayuda financiera para su investigación. El Adeptus Mechanicus promete compartir los beneficios que obtengan como consecuencia de su nuevo conocimiento e introducir el nombre de su benefactor{mf||a} en la bendita matriz de aliados valiosos.
languages.original_text: Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

traits.locale_text: Tras escuchar una multitud de historias sobre la riqueza de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los tecnosacerdotes solicitan ayuda financiera para su investigación. El Adeptus Mechanicus promete compartir los beneficios que obtengan como consecuencia de su nuevo conocimiento e introducir el nombre de su benefactor{mf||a} en la bendita matriz de aliados valiosos.

languages.text: Les technoprêtres, qui ont entendu maintes fois parler de la richesse {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, souhaitent qu'{mf|il|elle} finance leurs recherches. L'Adeptus Mechanicus promet de partager les profits réalisés grâce aux connaissances qu'ils acquerront et d'enregistrer le nom de leur {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} dans les données bénies d'importants alliés.
languages.original_text: Having heard many tales of the Rogue Trader's wealth, the Tech-Priests are requesting financing for their research. The Adeptus Mechanicus are promising to share their profits — the by-product of gaining knowledge — and enter their benefactor's name in the blessed data array of valuable allies.

traits.locale_text: Les technoprêtres, qui ont entendu maintes fois parler de la richesse {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, souhaitent qu'{mf|il|elle} finance leurs recherches. L'Adeptus Mechanicus promet de partager les profits réalisés grâce aux connaissances qu'ils acquerront et d'enregistrer le nom de leur {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} dans les données bénies d'importants alliés.
